# Attune Form (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M/DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature/3 levels

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No 

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 17

*You touch the pebble against your alliesâ€™ flesh and bring them into attunement with the plane.*

This spell allows you to attune the affected creatures to the plane you are currently on, negating the harmful effects of that plane. Affected creatures gain the protections described in the *[[Avoid Planar Effects (Spell)|avoid planar effects]]* spell.

*Arcane Material Component:* A bit of stone or earth from your home plane.
